table.name: vte_modules
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vte_modules` ( `module` varchar(50) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL, `valid` int(1) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`module`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1

table.name: vte_progressbar_settings
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vte_progressbar_settings` ( `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `module` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `field_name` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `active` int(1) DEFAULT '1', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
